stats.title: User counts#2
stats.sqlQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM User WHERE createdAt BETWEEN :period_start_date AND :period_end_date

stats.title: User counts#1
stats.sqlQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM User WHERE createdAt BETWEEN :period_start_date AND :period_end_date

cards.title: User available#2
cards.sqlQuery: SELECT DATE(createdAt) as date, COUNT(DISTINCT id) as user_count FROM User WHERE createdAt BETWEEN :period_start_date AND :period_end_date GROUP BY DATE(createdAt) ORDER BY date

cards.title: User available#1
cards.sqlQuery: SELECT DATE(createdAt) as date, COUNT(DISTINCT id) as user_count FROM User WHERE createdAt BETWEEN :period_start_date AND :period_end_date GROUP BY DATE(createdAt) ORDER BY date
